DiscordMessage: <color=#AAFF01><size=18>Get the Discord Kit!</size></color> Just talk to to the Purge Rust 5x bot and type /auth
KitMessage: <color=#AAFF01><size=18>Purge Rust offers VIP Kits</size></color> Go to https://purge-rust.tebex.io/
WipeMessage: <color=#AAFF01><size=18>Wipe Schedules</size></color> Eventually it will be Bi-Weekly, but as of now it wipes every Sunday at 06:00GMT, also BP wipe is every other Sunday also at 06:00GMT.</color>
